General.Name: Geo-Jade Petroleum Corp
General.Description: Geo-Jade Petroleum Corporation engages in the exploration and development of oil and gas properties in China. The company is also involved in the provision of technical development, consulting, and other services; production and sale of petrochemical products, pipeline production and construction materials, equipment, and oil refining; warehousing business; research and development, production, and sale of oil-related professional equipment; investment, development, and operation of energy basic industry; investment; research and development, production, and sale of electric power and new energy product technology; equity investment; development, production, and operation of high-tech projects and products; import and export of oil, technology, and agency; mining investment and development; and house leasing and property management. It holds interests in exploration blocks in the Pre-Caspian and Chu-Sarysu basins in Kazakhstan. The company was formerly known as Hainan Zhenghe Industrial Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Geo-Jade Petroleum Corporation in August 2014. Geo-Jade Petroleum Corporation was founded in 1984 and is based in Beijing, China.
